programme.title: Banned! The Mary Whitehouse Story

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: In Ellesmere Port, the back of Jamess house looks more like a building site than a garden. He is desperate for a makeover, and wants a Cornish coastal haven inspired by coastal trips to the seaside when he was a child. It also needs to be a safe space for his dog Boosh and for his two nieces, who are regular visitors. Working with a budget of £4,500, designers Charlie Dimmock and Lee Burkhill go head-to-head to produce a design that will fulfil Jamess brief and win him over.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Needing more space for books as well as an impressive collection of rocks, a couple from Edinburgh have Alistair Appleton to help them with their rural relocation to Northumberland.

programme.title: Attenborough and the Giant Sea Monster
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough investigates the discovery of a lifetime: the giant skull of a pliosaur. He joins two of the UKs most intrepid fossil hunters on their perilous expedition to excavate the skull from its resting place on a cliff face.

programme.desc: Matt Baker and Charlotte Smith are in Wrexham for the biggest date in the sheepdog trialling calendar - the Supreme. Set against the beautiful backdrop of Brynkinalt Estate, the finest dogs and handlers from across the UK and Ireland go head-to-head, showing off their skill, instinct and teamwork. After months of training and a year of tough qualifying trials, it all comes down to this - only one can walk away as Supreme Champion.

programme.desc: Back in civilisation, the honeymooners are paid a surprise visit from Davina, who reveals they will all face one final flare-out. Will they choose to commit to each other in the real world, or will they leave their relationships behind on Honeymoon Island forever?

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: An ex-UFC fighter tries to escape his dark past and penchant for violence by taking a job in a Florida roadhouse.

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: Mama Ru is back with a hot new cast of drag queens ready to do battle for the crown! Over the next ten weeks, the queens compete in a range of spicy challenges designed to test their drag mettle as they bid for the coveted title of the UKs Next Drag Race Superstar. In this premiere episode, the nervous energy is palpable as 12 brand new queens enter the werk room to meet their fellow competitors and judge supremo, RuPaul, for the very first time.

programme.title: Charlie Coopers Myth Country
programme.desc: Charlie goes in search of Black Shuck, the demon dog of East Anglia. He meets locals who disagree that seeing Shuck brings with it a curse. Keen to capture the beast on camera, he attempts an overnight stakeout, with unexpected consequences.

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: This is an average story of a very average woman. Of Spud, carer for her father, who cooks, cleans and serves badly and half-heartedly. A woman who is never seen or thanked. Ignored. A woman who, in spite of what society tells her, does not feel bad about herself. Who, despite not being young, or a mother, or, worst of all, beautiful, is actually quite happy in herself, if not her life. Then, one day, her dad dies, making her realise that she may have to come out of the shadows and be seen.

programme.title: Take a Hike
programme.desc: 40-year-old police officer Mike from Rhyl is in charge of the third hike. His walk starts at the famous Pen-y-Pass. He leads the group up the Miners Track and past the picturesque lakes of Llyn Teyrn and Llyn Llydaw.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Joe Crowley and Adam Henson explore the Solway Coast, where ancient traditions and fragile wildlife are being carefully nurtured by those who call this borderland home.

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: The BBCs Breakfast programme features the latest news, sport, business, weather and other items on a daily basis.

programme.title: Beechgrove Garden
programme.desc: With a packed programme of seasonal jobs and expert advice, the team help you prepare your garden for autumn and winter, and set the stage for a flying start to the 2026 season.

programme.title: Landward
programme.desc: Its a celebration of all creatures great and small. Dougies tracking red deer stags in Glen Affric. Anne finds out how AI is being used to identify dolphins accents.

programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Best Bites
programme.desc: More tasty treats from Anna Jones, Bryn Williams, Mandy Yin and Yotam Ottolenghi. Meanwhile, Rick Stein and the Hairy Bikers head out across the UK.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Bakeation
programme.desc: Si and Dave head to The Netherlands to bake Lazybones buns and sample a classic apple pie. Then to Belgium to taste the chocolate delights of Bruges and snort chocolate powder. Finally, to Luxembourg where they create pork pies with Riesling jelly.

programme.title: Sweet Charity
programme.desc: Bob Fosse directed this adaptation of Neil Simons play about a dance-hall hostess search for true love.

programme.title: UCI Road World Championships LIVE
programme.desc: JJ Chalmers presents live coverage of the closing stages of the mens road race at the UCI World Championships in Kigali, Rwanda. Tom Pidcock and Oscar Onley lead the British team on a hilly 267.5km course. Reigning champion Tadej Pogacar of Slovenia and Belgian Olympic champion Remco Evenepoel provide stiff competition on what promises to be a gruelling test of endurance. Plus highlights from the womens road race, where a new name looks set to be crowned world champion.

programme.title: The Sound of Music
programme.desc: Classic film version of the Rodgers and Hammerstein musical in which a novice nun leaves her convent to accept a position as governess to a large family. Despite their initial misgivings, she wins over the seven children and their disciplinarian father by sharing her love of music, but their happiness is threatened by the Nazi invasion of Austria. The film won five Oscars.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: In Plymouth, the crew respond to a mayday call - the highest level of emergency at sea - for a diver who has lost consciousness during a 30-metre dive to a shipwreck.

programme.title: Eva Longoria: Searching for Spain
programme.desc: Eva Longoria explores Barcelona and the Catalonia region, a Mediterranean hub of creativity and cuisine, where world-class chefs push the boundaries of Spanish food.

programme.title: Rob and Rylans Passage to India
programme.desc: Rob and Rylan are on the final leg of their Indian adventure. They discover an erotic temple, try mud wrestling for spiritual growth and go barefoot through Varanasi, Indias holiest city.

programme.title: American Fiction
programme.desc: English professor and author Thelonious "Monk" Ellison writes a satirical novel under a pseudonym, intending to expose the hypocrisies of the publishing industry.

programme.title: Ryder Cup Golf
programme.desc: Highlights from day 3 of the 45th Ryder Cup between Europe and the USA in New York.

programme.title: Close
programme.desc: The 13-year-old boys Leo and Remis have a close friendship at school and in the flower fields where they and their parents pick the harvest for home. When schoolmates shoot a wedge into the relationship, the consequences are fatal.

programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents an hour of topical debate.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: In todays episode from Nottinghamshire, Natasha Raskin Sharp learns about the ancient Chinese craft of paper cut art from artist Vanessa Stone.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The Roadshow is at Firstsite contemporary art gallery in Colchester, where finds include a Tiffany brooch, an electric guitar and a vase by renowned studio potter Hans Coper.

programme.desc: Premier League highlights.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Bridge of Lies
programme.desc: Ross Kemp presents as a team of four family members, Elisha, Emma, Georgia and Paul, take on the Bridge of Lies.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the quiz show where players face a question and pick from a board of six rankable answers. Some answers are good, but only one is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The two highest scoring chefs from north west England must go head-to-head and cook their six-course menus again. They need to impress a panel of exacting judges: Michelin-starred chef Tom Kerridge, chef and top restaurateur Nisha Katona.

programme.title: Wild West: Americas Great Frontier
programme.desc: This legendary land of red rocks and vast canyons, outlaws and gunslingers, is a brutally tough place to live. But nature has found some extraordinary ways to win through, forging a pioneering spirit found nowhere else on Earth. Discover the amazing ways that mustangs and coyotes, Hopi farmers and even desert tortoises have found to survive in this extremely testing land.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Paul Martin presents from Capesthorne Hall in Cheshire. Expert Mark Stacey finds a horse ledger, and Caroline Hawley uncovers a set of letters from Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. Paul also explores the harsh world of working in a Victorian cotton mill.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Melanie Bracewell, Ruth Madeley, Jenny Powell and Mark Steel test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Janette Manrara and Fleur East headline a show packed full of the latest headlines, backstage gossip, expert opinion and exclusive interviews to stay up-to-date with all of the celebs and their pro dance partners on Strictly Come Dancing.

programme.title: Global Eye
programme.desc: Bringing forensic journalism from all corners of the world.

programme.title: Mastermind
programme.desc: Clive Myrie asks the questions in another heat where the contenders answer questions on subjects including The Simpsons and the plays of Samuel Beckett.

programme.title: Only Connect
programme.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts the quiz where knowledge only gets you so far. Postmodern, Boris Johnson and frozen yoghurt - one team spotted the connection after three clues.

programme.title: University Challenge
programme.desc: Harper Adams University makes its first ever appearance in this competition. Their opponents are from the University of Strathclyde. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

programme.title: Secrets of the Brain
programme.desc: Professor Jim Al-Khalili unravels the mystery of how the most complex structure known of in the universe - the human brain - came to exist.

programme.title: Cunk on Earth
programme.desc: Philomena Cunk travels the world, heading down caves and up mountains in her search for mankinds first moments, and with the help of a variety of experts, she explains how the earliest societies were formed: from the easier ones to spell, like Rome and Greece, to the ones that are harder to spell, like Egypt and Mesopotamia.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Raging Bull
programme.desc: The story of Jake LaMotta, a former middleweight boxing champion, whose reputation for tenacity and success in the ring was offset by his troubled domestic life: full of rage, jealousy, and suspicion, particularly towards his wife and manager/brother, which in the end left him destitute, alone, and seeking redemption.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Joe Crowley and Adam Henson explore the Solway Coast, where ancient traditions and fragile wildlife are being carefully nurtured by those who call this borderland home.

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: Schuey and Agnes cause uproar when they rebel against Stellas new rules. New teacher Darius Donovan arrives and shakes up the staffroom as Jack Rimmer returns and tackles the troubles of a new generation on his first day as school counsellor. Elsewhere, Cat and Izzy lock horns over the schools new addition, and Stella is distracted as she struggles to integrate her estranged grandkids at the school.

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: Ashton takes drastic measures to help Donte when hes plunged into crippling debt. Meanwhile, Stella and Ben clash as the school welcomes a cohort of year six students, and Debs is excited to step into Wendys shoes for the day, but Nicky is forced to get involved when things get out of hand. Elsewhere, Jack tries to help Libby settle back into school life when she clashes with Aleena.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables

programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his best friends Chep and Lilit have all kinds of adventures in the forest. They are the protectors of the forest and they all have a unique power.

programme.title: Moley

programme.desc: Its Dannys birthday, and the team have given him a BMX bike, but Joy says he can only ride it when work finishes. Danny hasnt ridden a bike before, but that doesnt stop him trying to combine his list of jobs with learning to ride ride it.

programme.title: Danny and Mick
programme.desc: Danny and Micks boss, Joy, has had her office redecorated and has asked the brothers to put everything back in her office. As always, Danny and Mick get distracted and dont get the job done. Joy finds them messing about which causes Danny to accidentally spill a smoothie on her new wallpaper. Joy is unaware, so Danny and Mick need to secretly sort out the problem before she finds out! Danny and Mick dont do anything easily and ending up in a lot of mess with a lot of wallpaper paste!

Aaron heads to Devon to reveal how the water vole is being brought back from the brink of extinction.

Just as Bing almost gets it right, he gets carried away with spinning and breaks the hoop. Coco is upset she cant hula anymore - until Bing and Charlie remind her of all the other games they can still do with the bent hoop.

programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: When The In Chicks invent a new game, Love Monster and Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny have a great time playing it. But their turn soon ends, and the friends have to wait in a very long line for their next go.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Preston left an egg sandwich out for too long, and now its explosive smell is stinking up the whole town. Mojo and Bo need to evacuate everyone in Swoppiton before the eggy stinkplosion!

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: When Mtambo takes Koko, Piper and Hodge on a night tour through Safari Park, Koko discovers a new world of Chuggington that glows in the dark.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. Its great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Evil Pea tries to ruin Fruit and Veggie Friends Day, but Supertato keeps stopping her.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: As Bing gets ready to go to Sulas house, he feels sneezy and hot so Flop decides that Bing needs to stay at home and keep his germs to himself. Even though Bing is soon tucked up on the sofa with a hot honey and lemon drink, hes very disappointed that he cant play with Sula. But Sula and Amma bring him a carroty bagel to wish him a speedy recovery.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Nicky are sleeping over at Sulas house, but Bing has forgotten Hoppity. The wind causes a branch to make a scratchy noise that terrifies Bing, who isnt very comforted by Sulas fairy rhino. Amma phones Flop, while Sula, Nicky and Bing play Nicky tickles as they wait. Flop arrives, bringing his sleeping bag and Hoppity so they can all sleep over.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are off for a jamboree to make some new friends, play games and have a picnic. They meet another group of young animals with their very own version of Duggee but everything they do is different - even Roly finds one of them too loud!

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee has a package that needs delivering to the other end of the river, a long way from the clubhouse. It looks like the Squirrels are going to have a day out on the boat. Good job Duggee has his river badge.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Glitch makes a sand castle around an oasis in the Sahara. Can the Go Jetters save the day?

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Fish Out Of Water
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit wants to grow up to be just like his late father - he has big paws to fill. But with his fathers journal and the help of his best friends Benjamin and Lily, Peter is ready for some fun and delightful new discoveries.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: Shellington is excited to find the distinctive tooth of a very rare creature, the spade-toothed beaked whale. Now, the Octonauts must find the tooths owner, so Shellington can study it, and so that Peso can help replace its tooth. But it wont be easy: spade-toothed beaked whales like to be left alone and can dive very deep.

programme.title: Joe Wicks Activate
programme.desc: My AstroBurp Challenge is ready for launch! Are you ready to activate light speed? In this challenge, we are going to blast through squats, star jumps and burpees! Final destination, the Activate! Get ready to move with Joe and the Activators!

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: Sunny gets a tummy ache from not washing his hands, so Vida teaches him all about germs and helps his tummy.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Mojo and Bo join the big cross-town race with plans to win. But how can they stay ahead when they have to keep stopping and swopping to help other racers in trouble?

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Justin and his friends go on a fruit picking adventure. Meanwhile, Aunt Polly judges the annual Fabulous Fruit Competition, but what has Mr Tumble done to Grandads strawberries?

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: While camping in the bush, Bluey makes a new friend who doesnt speak the same language.

programme.title: Bluey

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Ethel slips up and lands with a very big bump. Then its Naughty Monkeys turn to fall down. The squirrels get Duggee and together they go to help Naughty Monkey, but they have to be very careful.

programme.title: Hey Duggee

programme.desc: The Piris hike to Tippety Top to see the southern lights, but must brave some ice fog.

programme.desc: Someones stopped the samba at the Rio carnival! Can the Go Jetters fix the glitch?

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Kyan wants to climb Mount Everest, but theres a giant snowball heading his way - and its got a moustache!

programme.desc: Team Spidey stops invisible Rhino from doing sneaky crimes across town. Team Spidey teams up with hero Squirrel Girl to stop Green Goblins Naughty Nutty Ray.

programme.desc: Kwazii and grandfather Calico Jack find a new island home for a band of beetles.

programme.desc: The Cobs try to capture Supertato while Evil Pea is on holiday, but it goes wrong resulting in Evil Pea getting covered in flour and custard over in the bath products aisle.

programme.desc: Lily comes across some special fruits capable of turbo-boosting the Korsairs boat.

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures

programme.desc: Dan the border collie is a search and rescue dog who works with his owner Jamie. His super nose follows scents and smells like clues, so they can rescue people who need their help. A mountain biker called Eddie hasnt made it back from a ride with his friends, and its starting to get dark. Police officer Penny needs Jamie and Dans help with a night search. They head to where he was last seen, and a friendly owl helps Dan find his scent.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Nyama is a type of stew from Zimbabwe. It uses a special type of young cabbage leaf called spring greens, which Pippa adds to her stew along with lots of other delicious ingredients. Pippa works hard preparing all the spices, chicken and shallots.

programme.title: Andys Aquatic Adventures
programme.desc: There is a new resident arriving at Safari World, an eight-month-old African elephant called Elly. Jen informs Andy that Elly is unfortunately an orphan. There are already some adult African elephants at Safari World, so they will look after her.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: When a lost bird takes a liking to Bo, it is up to Mojo to fly it to its home. But its a stormy trip, and Bo will need to do some flying of his own!

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is painting the clubhouse. The Squirrels ask if they can help too but they have some different colours in mind, and with the help of Tino the artistic mouse, some new painting techniques to throw in the mix. What will Duggee think of the clubhouses new look?

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: Captain Barnacles and his intrepid band of explorers roam the oceans in search of adventure and fun. The Octonauts help out an Albino Humpback Whale with a nasty sunburn.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: Koas nails are long and sharp, but hes afraid to cut them. Vida knows just how to make it fun: nail polish.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are finding out about an incredible fishy adventure called the salmon run. Every year, salmon swim from the oceans where they live all the way upstream to calm, shallow rivers to lay their eggs. On the way they have to leap up waterfalls, jump fish ladders and dash past hungry bears who try to catch them. Kyan thinks these fish are even better at fantastic gymnastics than he is! Ubercorn sets those co-ordinates for the Kenai River, Alaska.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: When the Go Jetters find the Grimbots shipping overripe tomatoes into the Spanish town of Bunol, they put a stop to whatever Glitch is up to - until they find out that the tomatoes were destined for the famous Tomatina Festival, the biggest food fight in the world. Can the Go Jetters fix their own glitch and save the festival?

programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: Its Frozen Fun Day, and Love Monster is having trouble learning to ice-skate. He asks Elder Kitten, who is much better at it, to teach him. Elder Kitten agrees to show him how and tells him that the trick is to get back up after falling.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: When the recycling gets blown over in the wind and scattered across the garden, Yukee and the gang not only pick it all up again, but also discover that some recycled materials can have musical uses too.

programme.desc: Its payment day. All the usual cleanliness concerns and facilities faults are on the agenda - as well as some unsavoury comments about hosting styles. But whos won?

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Were going back to school, as the bakers make canteen flapjacks, school cake and a school fete Showstopper. Wholl be top of the class, and wholl be expelled from the tent?

programme.title: Hotel Chocolat Unwrapped
programme.desc: Inside the wonderful world of Hotel Chocolat. A new line of savoury pastries and a fiery chili maple chocolate flavour are tested. And Boss Angus hatches a plan to take the USA by storm as he looks for a Chicago store.

programme.title: Educating Yorkshire
programme.desc: Year 11 students Skyler, Olivia and Falak feel the pressure as GCSEs edge closer. Headteacher Mr Burton leads a crackdown on mobile phones. And a special guest returns to school.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Jay Slater
programme.desc: Within hours of Jay Slaters disappearance in summer 2024, mass online interest set conspiracy theories flying. This is the exclusive story of Jays death and its extreme aftermath.

programme.title: Catching My Stalker
programme.desc: Grace and Daryl are living happily in Watford when a dangerous stalker tears everything apart. In a fight against the odds, they film everything - trying to get the stalker put behind bars.

programme.title: Father Stu
programme.desc: After surviving a motorcycle accident, a former boxer and longtime agnostic starts to wonder if he can use his second chance to help others, leading to the surprising realisation that hes meant to be a Catholic priest.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon tries to turn around the ailing fortunes of Grasshopper Also, a struggling restaurant in Carlstadt, New Jersey.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When Springfield Elementary is threatened with closure because of low test scores, the fate of the school rests on one student who missed the test, and who must raise the average above the minimum threshold: Bart Simpson.

programme.title: Banel et Adama
programme.desc: A young couple in Senegal must contend with the disapproval of people in a remote village.

programme.title: Afra Tafri
programme.desc: A young groom jeopardises his upcoming wedding after sending an abusive message to his bride, while under the influence of alcohol. Upon realising his mistake, he struggles to make amends for it and save the wedding.

programme.title: Trial Period
programme.desc: PD, an educated and unemployed man, serves a trial period of 30 days as Romis parent due to his demand for a new father to his mother, Anamaya Roy Choudhary.

programme.title: Paathshaala

programme.title: Chhalaang

programme.desc: The carefree son of a campus bookstore owner and an unattainable beauty find that their love-hate relationship is turning into all love.

programme.desc: Two lovers who dont believe in tying each other down have a mutual breakup when career comes calling. Despite moving on, they realise they long for each other.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: For the penultimate leg of their journey Bradley and Barney head to Italy, starting by the picturesque Lake Garda, where Barney surprises his dad by explaining they will be running off the top of Monte Baldo and paragliding over the lake below. Soon after, Bradley takes a dip in the lake when he tries paddleboard yoga. The next day the guys travel to the River Po for a boat trip like no other, as Bradley is treated to a hair-raising ride in a Formula 1 speed boat.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Barney and Bradley Walsh embark on the final leg of their European road trip, as they continue to explore Italy. Having reached Rome, they take a trip back in time to battle it out as gladiators. They continue south and make a stop to soak up the views from a sky high zipwire. As the boys reach their final stop on the Amalfi Coast, they get the chance to swim in the stunning sea, but theyll have to cliff dive in first.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys New Brain
programme.desc: Joey accidentally informs a cast member that she will be fired so that his character will get her characters brain, and Ross plans a surprise for Monica and Chandlers wedding - he wants to play the bagpipes.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Truth About London
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler fondly reminisce about London until a startling revelation leaves Chandler floored. Meanwhile, Rachel teaches Ben practical jokes to play on Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Cheap Wedding Dress
programme.desc: Monica regrets telling a fellow bride-to-be about a cheaper bridal shop, and later she has to fight the woman tooth and nail for a unique wedding dress before competing with her to hire Chandlers favourite band for the night. Meanwhile, Joey and Ross discover that theyre dating the same girl.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey is overjoyed to be nominated for a `Soapie, the third most prestigious award in daytime dramas. Meanwhile, engaged Monica frets when she realises she will never experience the thrill of a new relationship again, Ross spots Chandler sneaking out of a male strip club, and Phoebe meets a cute guy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Ross and Monicas Cousin
programme.desc: Monica is so perturbed by Chandlers instant attraction to her gorgeous visiting cousin that she persuades Ross to let her stay at his apartment. Despite being her blood relative, Ross cannot restrain himself from attempting to kiss her. She escapes to Phoebes apartment, but her beauty flabbergasts even Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Big Kiss
programme.desc: Rachel runs into an old sorority sister with whom she once shared a passionate encounter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: With only four weeks until their wedding, Monica and Chandler try to write their vows. Chandler enlists the boys help, while Monica does the same with the girls.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica convinces a reluctant Chandler to travel to Las Vegas to invite his estranged cross-dressing father to their wedding. Meanwhile, Rachel is furious that she is the only friend who Monica has not allowed to drive the Porsche that her father gave her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler And Monicas Wedding - Part 1
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler prepare for their wedding. Meanwhile, Joey is starring in a movie with a prestigious actor with a spitting problem.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler And Monicas Wedding - Part 2
programme.desc: Joey encounters problems trying to get off the movie set to officiate the wedding when the star turns up drunk.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Chandlers wedding reception is almost upstaged by the news that someone might be pregnant. Meanwhile, Ross tries to impress a pretty single woman, Chandler has troubles on the dance floor, and Joey hopes to impress Chandlers mums date - an important Broadway producer - with his acting ability.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Red Sweater
programme.desc: The girls speculate as to whos the father of Rachels baby, the guys scramble after Chandler loses the film from his wedding, and Monica wants to open the wedding gifts.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everybody seems to know who the father of Rachels baby is except the man himself. Meanwhile, Phoebe and Joey lie about a gas leak to get into Monica and Chandlers apartment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross and Rachels attempt to explain how they wound up in bed together quickly descends into an argument over who seduced who, until Ross shocks the room by announcing that he has the whole encounter on video. Meanwhile, Monica and Chandler return from their honeymoon, excited at the prospect of socialising with another just-married couple they met on the flight home.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross gets upset when Rachel goes out on a date with a handsome actor, Phoebe tries to prevent a chef from being sacked, and Chandler kills a co-workers promotion.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Halloween Party
programme.desc: At Monicas Halloween party, Phoebe meets the friendly fiance of her flighty twin Ursula, but becomes alarmed when she learns that her sister has misrepresented herself to her trusting future in-law.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross learns that a pregnant Rachel wants to move out and find a place of her own, so he suggests a vacancy in his building. Then he learns that the elderly occupant is not quite dead yet. Meanwhile, Phoebe is ecstatic when Eric dumps her twin sister Ursula and chooses her instead, and Monica comes unhinged when she suspects that her new maid is stealing her jeans, among other things.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Feeling guilty for denying Chandler a bachelor party, Monica hires a stripper to perform for him, without learning that shes a prostitute. Elsewhere, Rachels father learns about her pregnancy and plans to give Ross a piece of his mind.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: An old high-school friend of Monicas is invited to the Thanksgiving dinner with the gang, but Monica is unaware that he isnt exactly fond of Rachel. Meanwhile, Chandler and Phoebe pretend to be mesmerised by American football in order to avoid helping Monica in the kitchen, and Joey vows to devour the entire turkey single-handedly.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler is aghast when Monica buys painfully expensive boots, and Phoebe tries to capitalise on her discovery that Ross son attends school with the son of rock star Sting.

programme.title: Batteries not Included
programme.desc: A group of New York tenement dwellers face eviction and receive help from an unlikely source. Just when it seems that nothing short of a miracle will save their homes, a miracle is just what they get in the shape of tiny visitors from outer space whose magical powers have the bad guys on the run.

programme.title: Big Trouble in Little China
programme.desc: Jack Burto agrees to pick up a friends girlfriend from the airport, but when Miao Yin is kidnapped in front of him, Burton finds shes been abducted by sorcerer Lo Pan, the host of the spirit of an ancient Chinese warlord. He wants her for her unique green eyes, rare among Chinese women, that will rejuvenate his spirit and Burton has just hours to track down his lair and free Yin.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Asim Chaudhry, Maisie Adam and Kerry Godliman
programme.desc: ...Internet. Iain is joined by Asim Chaudhry, Maisie Adam and Kerry Godliman for a brutal roast of the internets weirdest moments, from cringe-inducing memes to the oddest online trends. (S1, E04)

Despite being her blood relative, Ross cannot restrain himself from attempting to kiss her. She escapes to Phoebes apartment, but her beauty flabbergasts even Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Big Kiss
programme.desc: Rachel runs into an old sorority sister with whom she once shared a passionate encounter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: With only four weeks until their wedding, Monica and Chandler try to write their vows. Chandler enlists the boys help, while Monica does the same with the girls.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica convinces a reluctant Chandler to travel to Las Vegas to invite his estranged cross-dressing father to their wedding. Meanwhile, Rachel is furious that she is the only friend who Monica has not allowed to drive the Porsche that her father gave her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler And Monicas Wedding - Part 1
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler prepare for their wedding. Meanwhile, Joey is starring in a movie with a prestigious actor with a spitting problem.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler And Monicas Wedding - Part 2
programme.desc: Joey encounters problems trying to get off the movie set to officiate the wedding when the star turns up drunk.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Chandlers wedding reception is almost upstaged by the news that someone might be pregnant. Meanwhile, Ross tries to impress a pretty single woman, Chandler has troubles on the dance floor, and Joey hopes to impress Chandlers mums date - an important Broadway producer - with his acting ability.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Red Sweater
programme.desc: The girls speculate as to whos the father of Rachels baby, the guys scramble after Chandler loses the film from his wedding, and Monica wants to open the wedding gifts.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everybody seems to know who the father of Rachels baby is except the man himself. Meanwhile, Phoebe and Joey lie about a gas leak to get into Monica and Chandlers apartment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross and Rachels attempt to explain how they wound up in bed together quickly descends into an argument over who seduced who, until Ross shocks the room by announcing that he has the whole encounter on video. Meanwhile, Monica and Chandler return from their honeymoon, excited at the prospect of socialising with another just-married couple they met on the flight home.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross gets upset when Rachel goes out on a date with a handsome actor, Phoebe tries to prevent a chef from being sacked, and Chandler kills a co-workers promotion.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Halloween Party
programme.desc: At Monicas Halloween party, Phoebe meets the friendly fiance of her flighty twin Ursula, but becomes alarmed when she learns that her sister has misrepresented herself to her trusting future in-law.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross learns that a pregnant Rachel wants to move out and find a place of her own, so he suggests a vacancy in his building. Then he learns that the elderly occupant is not quite dead yet. Meanwhile, Phoebe is ecstatic when Eric dumps her twin sister Ursula and chooses her instead, and Monica comes unhinged when she suspects that her new maid is stealing her jeans, among other things.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Feeling guilty for denying Chandler a bachelor party, Monica hires a stripper to perform for him, without learning that shes a prostitute. Elsewhere, Rachels father learns about her pregnancy and plans to give Ross a piece of his mind.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: An old high-school friend of Monicas is invited to the Thanksgiving dinner with the gang, but Monica is unaware that he isnt exactly fond of Rachel. Meanwhile, Chandler and Phoebe pretend to be mesmerised by American football in order to avoid helping Monica in the kitchen, and Joey vows to devour the entire turkey single-handedly.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler is aghast when Monica buys painfully expensive boots, and Phoebe tries to capitalise on her discovery that Ross son attends school with the son of rock star Sting.

programme.title: Batteries not Included
programme.desc: A group of New York tenement dwellers face eviction and receive help from an unlikely source. Just when it seems that nothing short of a miracle will save their homes, a miracle is just what they get in the shape of tiny visitors from outer space whose magical powers have the bad guys on the run.

programme.title: Big Trouble in Little China
programme.desc: Jack Burto agrees to pick up a friends girlfriend from the airport, but when Miao Yin is kidnapped in front of him, Burton finds shes been abducted by sorcerer Lo Pan, the host of the spirit of an ancient Chinese warlord. He wants her for her unique green eyes, rare among Chinese women, that will rejuvenate his spirit and Burton has just hours to track down his lair and free Yin.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Asim Chaudhry, Maisie Adam and Kerry Godliman
programme.desc: ...Internet. Iain is joined by Asim Chaudhry, Maisie Adam and Kerry Godliman for a brutal roast of the internets weirdest moments, from cringe-inducing memes to the oddest online trends. (S1, E04)

programme.title: CC Live: Stand-Up Shorts
programme.sub-title: Stephen Bailey, Leah Davies, Richard Stott and Kazeem Jamal
programme.desc: Fresh and hilarious stand-up from four of the UKs hottest comics is what is in store for the finale. Stephen Bailey, Leah Davies, Richard Stott and Kazeem Jamal share jokes on football, parenthood and waxing woes.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA

programme.title: The Ricky Gervais Show

programme.title: The Ricky Gervais Show

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Ed tackles an epic mountain climb in Mongolias Gobi Desert. Going five days without a solid meal, can he thrive in one of earths most isolated spots?

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Ed heads to deserts of Namibia to test his survival skills. Its the end of the dry season, and Ed has to build his strength in the fierce heat to hunt the elusive warthog.

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Adventurer Ed Stafford has walked the length of the Amazon River - he is the first person to accomplish that - and survived alone for 60 days on a desert island near Fiji (a feat chronicled in `Naked Castaway), so perhaps the challenges presented in `Marooned arent that daunting. Filmed in Venezuelas Gran Sabana mountains, Botswanas Okavango Delta, Romanias Carpathian Mountains, the Western Australia coast, and Borneos Brunei jungles, the five hourlong episodes see Stafford - a former British Army captain - attempt to last ten days in the harsh environments with nothing more than a camera. Viewers are provided a fly-on-the-wall perspective as Ed tries to find food, make fire, process water to drink, and build a shelter - among many other life-saving challenges.

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: Kringle gets a job at Coles department store on 34th Street thanks to toy department executive Dorey Walker, who, like her daughter Susan doesnt believe in Santa Claus. However, such is Kringles success that a rival store, losing money, decides to have him declared insane for his insistence on his identity. The case comes to trial, with Doreys would-be-suitor out to prove that he really is Santa Claus.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout Interview Special

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: American submarine Captain Joe Glass is on the hunt for a U.S. sub in distress in the Arctic Ocean. He soon learns that a secret Russian coup is in the offing, a conspiracy that threatens to dismantle the world order. With crew and country on the line, Glass must assemble an elite group of Navy SEALs to sneak through enemy waters, rescue the kidnapped Russian president and prevent World War III.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible -- Fallout
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team join forces with CIA assassin August Walker to prevent a disaster of epic proportions. Arms dealer John Lark and a group of terrorists known as the Apostles plan to use three plutonium cores for a simultaneous nuclear attack on the Vatican, Jerusalem and Mecca. When the weapons go missing, Ethan and his crew find themselves in a desperate race against time to prevent them from falling into the wrong hands.

Unexpectedly thrust into an international conspiracy, the gals soon find themselves dodging killers and a suspicious British agent while hatching a plan to save the world.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: For alternative ingredients week, the bakers must bake without sugar, gluten or dairy. The signature challenge requires sugar free cakes, the technical challenge is gluten free pittas and the showstopper calls for dairy free ice cream rolls.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Its pastry week and the bakers begin with frangipane tarts for the signature challenge. The technical challenge calls for the flaouna, a traditional cheese filled pastry from Cyprus. The showstopper is the classic 70s canape, vol au vents.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: In a `Bake Off first, the entire episode is devoted to the period of history that gave birth to modern baking, the Victorians. The signature challenge is a stalwart of the Victorian dinner table, Game Pie.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The pressure is on, as the remaining bakers must get to grips with the one of the most difficult ingredients, chocolate.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Only three of the original twelve bakers remain. Theyve made it to the final. Over 27 challenges, theyve worked their way through every baking discipline Mary and Paul have thrown at them from cakes to bread, pastry to puddings, and biscuits to chocolate.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is joined by Michelin-starred chef Gareth Ward. They enjoy some Welsh Mountain cider tasting, then James uses some to dish up some cider- infused apple fritters with cider custard. Gareth discovers a cattle farm which rears Welsh Wagyu cattle who are fed on local beer. Later they take time out and Gareth is challenged to a thrilling rally car ride, while James demonstrates his dog training prowess with his trusty hound Cooper.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: Jamess final stop is in Englands first National Park: The Peak District. He is joined by cooking legend Tessa Bramley, who serves him up a delicious beef fillet along with vegetables from her beautiful garden. James takes part in an unusual contest, hen racing, where he challenges a local lad and world champion to a race. After discovering some award-winning gin, James meets a local forager and samples some of his elderflower wine.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James returns home to his native Yorkshire, where he is joined by good friend and multi award-winning chef Brian Turner. James visits top chef Frances Atkins beautiful restaurant the Yorke Arms, where he enjoys her signature dish al fresco, in her unusual dining room the Onion. Brian tastes the delights of some Yorkshire charcuterie, and later they both take time out, where James brushes up his clay pigeon skills and Brian is challenged to some off-road driving.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James visits the stunning Lake District, where he is joined by top Michelin-starred chef Clare Smyth. James visits Clares meat suppliers the Lake District Farmers, while Clare learns the secret of the Lake Districts famous sticky toffee pudding. They both visit the Windermere Jetty Museum, and are treated to a trip out on Lake Windermere on a traditional steam-powered boat.

programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. Oh, and raising their first child. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Its an unprecedented view of young mothers facing the responsibilities of parenthood as their children enter kindergarten, start little league and reach other milestones of youth.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. Oh, and raising their first child. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Its an unprecedented view of young mothers facing the responsibilities of parenthood as their children enter kindergarten, start little league and reach other milestones of youth.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.desc: Catherine seems to have a hankering for items with an aeronautical theme, one of which takes her back to her childhood. David has a flashback to his school cricket team and gives a demonstration of his prowess.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 5
programme.desc: In Rio de Janeiro, ex-con Dom Torretto and ex-cop Brian OConner join forces against a corrupt businessman who wants them both dead.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 6
programme.desc: Since Dom and Brians heist in Rio they must live as fugitives. Meanwhile, Agent Hobbs has been tracking a gang of lethally skilled mercenary drivers. Hobbs asks Dom and his crew for help in exchange for full pardons for everyone.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 7
programme.desc: After defeating international terrorist Owen Shaw, Dominic Toretto, Brian OConner and the rest of the crew have separated to return to more normal lives. However, Deckard Shaw, Owens older brother, is thirsty for revenge. A slick government agent offers to help Dom and company take care of Shaw in exchange for their help in rescuing a kidnapped computer hacker who has developed a powerful surveillance program.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 8
programme.desc: The globetrotting crew faces an unexpected challenge when a mysterious woman named Cipher forces Dom to betray them all. Now, they must unite to bring home the man who made them a family and stop her from unleashing chaos on a grand scale.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Brixton Lorr is a cybernetically enhanced soldier who possesses superhuman strength, a brilliant mind and a lethal pathogen that could wipe out half of the worlds population. Its now up to hulking lawman Luke Hobbs and lawless operative Deckard Shaw to put aside their past differences and work together to prevent the seemingly indestructible Lorr from destroying humanity.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: An undercover cop infiltrates a gang of LA street racers while investigating a rash of truck robberies.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: To clear his criminal record a former LA cop must infiltrate the Miami street-racing scene to set up a drug baron. Burning rubber all over the city with his ex-con friend, he attempts to deliver the crook to the FBI without crashing and being blown to pieces in one of the many explosions.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: Street-racing sequel following an adrenaline-junkie automobile addict who narrowly avoids jail by agreeing to move in with his father in Tokyo. However, he soon discovers the thrill of the local underground drift racing scene and unwittingly becomes involved with the Yakuza.

programme.title: Fast and Furious
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto is forced to come out of hiding when a loved one is brutally murdered. Heading to LA to track down the culprit, he crosses paths with Brian OConnor, the FBI agent whose undercover infiltration of Torettos gang led to the motorised miscreants exile across the border. The two men temporarily put their differences aside as they investigate the killing.

A slick government agent offers to help Dom and company take care of Shaw in exchange for their help in rescuing a kidnapped computer hacker who has developed a powerful surveillance program.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 5
programme.desc: In Rio de Janeiro, ex-con Dom Torretto and ex-cop Brian OConner join forces against a corrupt businessman who wants them both dead.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 6
programme.desc: Since Dom and Brians heist in Rio they must live as fugitives. Meanwhile, Agent Hobbs has been tracking a gang of lethally skilled mercenary drivers. Hobbs asks Dom and his crew for help in exchange for full pardons for everyone.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 7

A slick government agent offers to help Dom and company take care of Shaw in exchange for their help in rescuing a kidnapped computer hacker who has developed a powerful surveillance program.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 8
programme.desc: The globetrotting crew faces an unexpected challenge when a mysterious woman named Cipher forces Dom to betray them all. Now, they must unite to bring home the man who made them a family and stop her from unleashing chaos on a grand scale.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Brixton Lorr is a cybernetically enhanced soldier who possesses superhuman strength, a brilliant mind and a lethal pathogen that could wipe out half of the worlds population. Its now up to hulking lawman Luke Hobbs and lawless operative Deckard Shaw to put aside their past differences and work together to prevent the seemingly indestructible Lorr from destroying humanity.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: An undercover cop infiltrates a gang of LA street racers while investigating a rash of truck robberies.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: To clear his criminal record a former LA cop must infiltrate the Miami street-racing scene to set up a drug baron. Burning rubber all over the city with his ex-con friend, he attempts to deliver the crook to the FBI without crashing and being blown to pieces in one of the many explosions.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: Street-racing sequel following an adrenaline-junkie automobile addict who narrowly avoids jail by agreeing to move in with his father in Tokyo. However, he soon discovers the thrill of the local underground drift racing scene and unwittingly becomes involved with the Yakuza.

programme.title: Fast and Furious
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto is forced to come out of hiding when a loved one is brutally murdered. Heading to LA to track down the culprit, he crosses paths with Brian OConnor, the FBI agent whose undercover infiltration of Torettos gang led to the motorised miscreants exile across the border. The two men temporarily put their differences aside as they investigate the killing.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 5

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: When a powerful shape-shifting sorceress sets her eyes on Pos Staff of Wisdom, he suddenly realises hes going to need some help. Teaming up with a quick-witted corsac fox, he soon discovers that heroes can be found in the most unexpected places.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Po might just be the laziest, clumsiest panda in the Valley of Peace, but he secretly dreams of becoming a kung fu legend. When the villainous snow leopard Tai Lung threatens Pos homeland, the hapless panda is chosen to fulfil an ancient prophecy and defend the Valley from attack. Training under Master Shifu, Po embarks on an epic high-kicking adventure as he sets out to thwart Tai Lungs evil plans. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po must unlock secrets of his past in order to defeat a formidable villain who plans to wipe out kung fu and conquer China. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydias life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuices name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: The Book of Clarence
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck man struggles to find a better life for his family while fighting to free himself of debt. Captivated by the power and glory of the rising Messiah, he risks everything to carve his own path to a divine life.

programme.title: The Book of Clarence

programme.title: The Book of Clarence
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck man struggles to find a better life for his family while fighting to free himself of debt. Captivated by the power and glory of the rising Messiah, he risks everything to carve his own path to a divine life.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a group of Allied POWs who engineered a bold escape from a Nazi camp during World War II. The escape committees plan is to liberate hundreds of inmates and cause havoc throughout occupied territory, but their problems include concealing three tunnels from the guards and disposing of numerous tons of soil.

programme.title: Five Easy Pieces
programme.desc: A once-talented pianist rejects his promising career to live a relaxed, blue-collar life as an oil rigger. On discovering that his father is ill some years later, he reluctantly returns home, only to find that he no longer fits in with either his artistic family or his working-class friends.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: Released from jail, Lang returns to his hometown in Northwest China. As part of a dog patrol tasked with clearing stray dogs before the 2008 Olympics, he bonds with a black stray. The two lonely souls embark on a new journey together.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: Shadowy figures from Christian Greys past threaten to destroy his rekindled romance with Anastasia Steele.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A group of talking dogs save the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The turtles spring into action to battle Shredder, mad scientist Baxter Stockman, Bebop, Rocksteady and the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: IF
programme.desc: After discovering she can see everyones imaginary friends, a girl embarks on a magical adventure to reconnect forgotten IFs with their kids.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Alan Parrish disappeared as a young boy. Nobody believes his friends story that he was sucked into the game they were playing. Twenty-six years later, two children find the game in their attic, and when they start to play, Alan is released, but the game isnt over yet, and Alan must finish before he is really free.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April ONeil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Spoof spy caper with the eponymous, blundering hero attempting to recover the crown jewels and save Britain from an evil mastermind when all the other agents are killed. Promoted from lowly pen pusher to super spy, Johnny English is baffled when clues lead to respected entrepreneur Pascal Sauvage, but could the enigmatic Lorna hold the key to the mystery?

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A group of talking dogs save the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Son of Memphis and Norma, little sweet penguin Mumble has a big problem: he cant sing a single note. In a world where everyone needs a heart song to attract a soul mate, Mumble feels he doesnt belong there. Our hero Mumble is the worst singer in the world, but he can tap dance brilliantly.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Focusing on a young Willy Wonka and how he came to meet the Oompa-Loompas on one of his earliest adventures.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: Matilda is a gifted child, more gifted than any other, but her parents wont let her go to school. She teaches herself for years by going to the library and reading everything she sees. Eventually she convinces her parents to let her go to school, but discovers her special talents are needed to protect the school and her lovely teacher from the evil headmistress.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: The Longest Yard

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Repo Man
programme.desc: Bud is a repo man - his job is to hunt down and re-possess cars on which the owners payment is overdue. Sometimes dirty, sometimes dangerous, usually drug-fuelled, he takes on Otto Maddox as an apprentice and starts teaching him the tricks of the trade. Then the call for the big job goes out - $20,000 to the first to track down a 1964 Chevy Malibu. Suddenly every repo man in the city is on the case - as are government agents.

programme.title: Jules

programme.desc: Selina tries to finish her book; Selina and her staff prepare for her portrait-unveiling ceremony; Jonah tries to get on the guest list for Selinas ceremony; Dan works on his on-screen chemistry problem.

programme.title: Veep

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Samantha must be keen on Jerry - she agrees to travel to Brooklyn to see his play, which bores her rigid until he steals the show with his trouser-dropping performance. In the money, Carrie buys Berger a Prada shirt but, after learning some news about him, realises she may have been a little tactless.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie isnt keen on serving jury duty, but is more concerned with the problems in her relationship with Berger. Mirandas work commitments are affecting her relationship with baby Brady, and the matchmakers at the synagogue set Charlotte up on a series of awful dates. She just wants her Harry back. Samantha, meanwhile, is having no such problems, as Smith (formerly Jerry) becomes more and more of a star.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie agrees to go to Bed, a hot new club, to get over the stress caused by Berger, and Charlotte contends everything happens for a reason - even failed marriages.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie considers the idea of a true catch, Charlotte has an important photo taken, and Miranda is anxious about meeting Steves girlfriend.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carries Manolos are stolen at a party, Miranda spots potential in her new co-op neighbour, Robert, and Samantha loses a battle for restaurant rights to a child.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.sub-title: Threes a Crowd, Six Is a Freak Show
programme.desc: Grace has trouble accepting her new beau when she learns he has six toes on one of his feet.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Will is annoyed by Graces behaviour when they are asked to read at the civil union of two friends. He feels like she is acting more like a wife than an old friend. Meanwhile, Karen tries to help a caffeine-addicted Jack recover from a failed crush.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Will and Grace pose as millionaires while visiting the townhouse of Sandra Bernhard, but their plans go awry when Sandra Bernhard accepts an offer they end up making on her house.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Will attempts to impress a new friend, sports journalist Matt, with his baseball skills, but ends up having to take advice from Grace.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Wills boyfriend Matt is reluctant to admit his sexuality to his macho business associates, so tells them Will is his brother. Meanwhile, Karen is horrified to learn that Will helped draft her husbands charity-friendly will.

programme.title: The Office

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: The office is in crisis mode after a large shipment of Dunder Mifflin paper is accidentally sent out with an obscene watermark. Michael then tries to manage the media with an impromptu press conference.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Outrage breaks out in the office after Phyllis gets an unexpected eyeful from a flasher, and Michael makes some important personal decisions when he takes the women on a special outing.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael is being considered for a position in the corporate department and has to recommend his replacement. While the group expects a fun outing at Lake Scranton, Michael has planned a day of `Survivor-like competitions to find his successor.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: The office is still buzzing from the events of their day at the beach. A job opening in Corporate pits coworker against coworker as Michael, Jim and Karen all head to New York for final interviews. In Scranton, Dwights plays an interesting role, and Jan comes in with exciting news.

programme.title: Girls

On the descent, Simpson fell, breaking his leg. Yates lowered him down the mountain 300 feet at a time; until he lowered Simpson over a precipice.

programme.title: The Truth vs. Alex Jones
programme.desc: Focuses on the aftermath of the 2012 Sandy Hook Elementary School shootings and the defamation lawsuit against conspiracy theorist Alex Jones.

programme.title: An American Bombing: The Road to April 19th
programme.desc: Explores the dangers of escalating homegrown violence in the United States by taking a look at the Oklahoma City bombing in 1995, the deadliest act of domestic terrorism in the country.

programme.title: I Am Bruce Lee
programme.desc: An insightful film documenting the life of actor and martial artist Bruce Lee, with insight from his family shedding light on who he really was.

programme.title: Digging for Britain

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tickety Town is covered in fallen leaves, so Tommy and Tallulah are using McCogginss new prototype street sweeper to clear them. However, in their eagerness to speed things up, they go against his instructions and press the turbo button. Suddenly, the sweeper goes haywire, rampaging through town and sucking up anything in its path, including Madame Au Laits clock key and very nearly Hopparoo too.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The whole town gathers to take part in McCoggins treasure hunt. Whoever finds the most cogs will be the winner. Knowing that McCoggins hides the cogs in the same places every year, Tommy and Tallulah are cruising to victory, until they realise that a quick win will spoil everyones day, but when they borrow McCoggins special clockwork rollerskates to put the cogs back, the skates zoom out of control.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins decide that everyone must get active and turn Tickety town into a boot camp. With Tommy banging his drum and Tallulah blowing on her trumpet, soon everyone is lifting, running, puffing and panting. They are all so exhausted that they fall fast asleep, but with Chime Time imminent, they must find a way to wake up Puffertys wheels.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: When Hopparoo bursts all their bubbles with his sharp ears, the twins use McCoggins extra-strong bubble mixture instead and blow a bubble so huge that it engulfs Battersby, Madame Au Lait, McCoggins, Lopsiloo, Chikidee and finally Tommy and Tallulah themselves! Where is Hopparoo? Only his sharp ears can free them for Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah love dressing up and surprising each other with their crazy costumes, but when they decide to surprise everybody else in town too Hopparoo is not impressed. programme.title: Tickety Toc

Trying to re-create the pot is even more of a disaster. Huge quantities of clay fly from their wheel into the town, blocking Puffertys tracks.

Marge is still really angry, so Homer agrees to get rid of the gun, but later Bart and Milhouse find it in the fridge.

programme.title: David Attenborough: Micro Monsters
programme.desc: Its a bug-eating world out there, and the documentary continues with a look at how the various critters disable the defences of their respective prey.

programme.desc: David Attenborough uses fossil evidence and CGI to reveal the story of the vertebrates, from their humble origins as the primitive fish that once swam in ancient seas, to their radical move onto land and beyond.
