programme.desc: The task force clashes with local law enforcement in Virginia while investigating a suspected serial killer in the area; Remy pushes Abby to take the next step.

programme.title: Kantara
programme.desc: A death in the village of Dakshina Kannada leads to a war between the villagers and the forces of evil.

programme.title: Phir Aayi Hasseen Dillruba
programme.desc: Escaping from the police in Agra, Rani and Rishu decide to elope together. When their plan goes awry, Rani seeks a helping hand from a kind admirer.

programme.title: An Action Hero
programme.desc: A murder accusation turns a movie stars own life into an eccentric action thriller as he flees the country, with a vengeful politician hot on his heels.

programme.title: Kuch Naa Kaho
programme.desc: A secretarys manager tells her to find a match for his nephew who does not want to get married. The nephew rejects every proposal and falls in love with the secretary instead.

programme.title: Hit the First Case
programme.desc: Burdened by old demons, a troubled but brilliant detective sets out to solve two confounding abduction cases, one involving his own girlfriend.

programme.title: Parineeta
programme.desc: Retired Gurcharan lives in a beautiful house with his two lovely daughters. Unable to repay a loan, he is forced to re-mortgage his property to his neighbour, ruthless businessman Navin Rai. Meanwhile Gurcharans niece Lolita falls in love with Rais son, her childhood friend Shekhar.

programme.title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3
programme.desc: In Kolkata, Rooh Baba enters a spooky estate where he confronts a pair of vindictive ghosts, both asserting to be Manjulika.

programme.title: Adipurush
programme.desc: Raghav, the prince of the Ikshvaku dynasty from Kosala, tries to rescue his wife, Janaki, from the demon king Lankesh.

programme.title: Love Breakups Zindagi
programme.desc: A couple and their friends go through changes and challenges after their wedding.

programme.title: Colour Photo
programme.desc: Jayakrishna and Deepthi are engineering students from contrasting backgrounds. Despite their vastly different upbringings, they fall for each other when circumstances bring them together unexpectedly.

programme.desc: A gang with weapons murders a young dad. Detectives crack the case with CCTV, phone and intel.

programme.title: Secrets of a Murder Detective
programme.desc: Steve Keogh discusses the murder of Jodie Chesney, a 17-year old girl stabbed in a park.

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Eight days after she had disappeared on her way to a family ski trip, an 18-year-old young womans partially nude body is found floating in a river in Wyoming, Years later, DNA technology uncovers dark secrets that led to her demise.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: An upscale apparel store in Bethesda, Md., is the site of a gruesome scene when an employee is killed and her coworker is battered and tied up, but surveillance video and blood evidence shed further light on the crime.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When the 20-year-old clerk of an Atlanta-area smoke shop is gunned down during a robbery, investigators have only descriptions of the killers and the make of their getaway car; investigators use a videotaped confession to smoke out the killers.

programme.desc: A young father goes to jail for breaking into his own home; a woman sues for medical bills after being hit by a car as she crossed the street.

programme.desc: A young woman says her ex-friends took her car without permission and crashed it; a man and his mother fight over a TV, rent and a loan; former friends are in a custody dispute over a deceased friends race car.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo arrives in the sailing haven of Lymington where he makes a lifesaving discovery. Exploring Dorchesters literary landscape, he finds out how the coming of the railways inspired the work of the regions greatest writer - Thomas Hardy.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In Plymouth, Michael finds out about the Royal Navys fighting spirit and mixes his own blend of ruin. Crossing into Cornwall, Michael learns about the last bridge to be built by one of his heroes, the engineer Isambard Kingdom Brunel.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Every train ride begins with a whistle and Michael Portillos new railway journey is no exception, blasting off from Birminghams jewellery quarter to the sound of the Acme whistle, manufactured there since 1884. A visit to the citys town hall reveals a magnificent organ and the location for a celebrated music festival.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo heads for the sharp end of the Victorian industrial revolution at a needle manufactory in Redditch. The Freemasons of Cheltenham invite Michael into their Lodge to share the secrets of their society. In Gloucester, he learns how to make Gloucester cheese. Continuing on to Highnam, Michael is glad to discover the beautiful Victorian Gothic church of Thomas Parry and to join the Gloucester Choral Society in a rendition of Jerusalem, composed by Thomass son, Hubert.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.desc: The role played by engineering giant Vickers during the Second World War, including the development of the Spitfire and how the Royal Navy recovered from losing so many warships.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.desc: How the Americans, once they were provoked into war, out-produced the rest of the world so quickly and by such a huge margin, including the likes of General Motors.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.desc: Henry Fords plan, with the help of Albert Kahn, to build a giant factory in Michigan, covering 3.5million sq ft and including an aircraft production line half a mile in length.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team fall for a Subaru Pick-up, which has all the Mathewsons in agreement. But will it all come crashing down when picking up parts proves tricky?

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A 1973 Ford Escort Mexico is the teams most expensive purchase to date. To save some cash Derek helps on their second buy - a 1968 Riley Kestrel.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek journeys to Essex to collect Pete Woods Austin Allegro, which has been sitting in an aircraft hangar at Audley End for 20 years.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: The boys take on a Citroen BX with no breaks, bad paintwork and a rodent infestation. Theyve got five days to fix it and flog it. Can they get it through its MOT?

programme.title: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: It is the green of the sea that brings life to oceans. Here, sunlight powers the growth of kelp, mangroves and sea grass. The green seas teem with life, where cuttlefish do battle for a mate and an octopus outwits deadly sharks.

programme.title: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: Coasts are the most changeable of the ocean world, but they offer great riches. They bring great rewards but also great danger. Here, sea lions beach large tuna, and moray eels crawl over land to catch their prey.

programme.title: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: Uncovering the impact that modern lives are having on ocean creatures, from albatross parents feeding their chicks discarded plastic, to mother dolphins potentially exposing their calves to pollutants through contaminated milk.

programme.title: Attenborough and the Sea Dragon
programme.desc: On the Jurassic coast of Britain a remarkable 200-million-year-old fossil is discovered: the bones of an ichthyosaur, a giant sea dragon. David Attenborough joins the hunt to bring this ancient creatures story to life. Using state-of-the-art imaging technology and CGI, the team reconstruct the skeleton and create the most detailed animation of an ichthyosaur ever made.

programme.title: This World
programme.desc: Adventurer and journalist Simon Reeve heads to one of the most spectacular countries in the world, Colombia, to explore the countrys precarious future.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: The boys take on a Citroen BX with no breaks, bad paintwork and a rodent infestation. Theyve got five days to fix it and flog it. Can they get it through its MOT?

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek journeys to Essex to collect Pete Woods Austin Allegro, which has been sitting in an aircraft hangar at Audley End for 20 years.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team pay over the odds for a VW Campervan, but can they hope to break even when they turn out a lovely bus for auction.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A 1969 Morris Mini Cooper MkII is totally restored by specialists. They give it the full works, which means only one thing... any chance of profit heads towards an open window.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The Restoring Classics team set out on a Pre-War challenge with a 1939 three wheeled Morgan F4 - and aptly named Russ Storer from MG Mecca is still keen to take it on.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A near-perfect 50s Chevy panel van and a very desirable low-mileage 80s Brooklands Capri tempt auctioneer Derek out of Yorkshire.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: The team struggles to explain how a DAF 33 gearbox works, and office manager Sarah attempts to bring order to the auto memorabilia sale.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.title: Gurgaon
programme.desc: Revolving around the kidnapping of Preet, whos family receives a midnight call and have to figure out how to track him.

programme.title: King of Kotha
programme.desc: A man falls in love with a woman from a wealthy background as he finds himself struggling between his inherited legacy of crime and a desire for a life different from his fathers.

programme.title: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Coaches, mentors and friends inspire young M.S. Dhoni to become a master cricketer and captain of Team India.

programme.title: Chandni
programme.desc: Rohit and Chandni become engaged in spite of their families refusal, based on their class differences, but when Rohit loses the function of his legs in a road accident, he leaves Chandni rather than placing a burden on her. Years later, Rohit has made a full recovery, and sets out to find Chandni, but when he does, she is engaged to another man.

programme.title: Sultan
programme.desc: The story of an oppressed child who is punished for his masters doings, and grows up to become a notorious criminal. A confrontation between him, his former master, and a police man only makes things worse.

programme.title: Stree 2: Sarkate Ka Aatank
programme.desc: The town of Chanderi is being haunted again. This time, women are mysteriously abducted by a terrifying headless entity. Once again, it is up to Vicky and his friends to save their town and loved ones.

programme.title: New York
programme.desc: An Indian taxi driver in New York is arrested for alleged terrorism, but after being proven innocent, the US National Security Agency gives him the mission of bringing down a terrorist leader, who was once the taxi drivers friend at university.

programme.title: Tubelight
programme.desc: Set in a small town in the hills of northern India, the story of one mans love for his family and his unshakeable belief in himself.
